channel.title: SRC Lab.
channel.description: College of AI Convergence, School of Artificial Intelligence, Chonnam National University

item.title: A paper, entitled "Real-time Reconfigurable Hardware Architecture for Regular Expression Matching in DPI", has been accepted to the Annual Computer Security Applications Conference (ACSAC) 2021.
Taejune Park was appointed as an Assistant Professor in the College of AI Convergence, School of Artificial Intelligence at Chonnam National University
